HPI 947 Subaru Impreza GD WRC2006 2006 Rally Japan 6th Place T. Arai/T. Sircombe



Toshihiro Arai is a Japanese rally driver who drove for the Subaru World Rally team from 1997-2000 and 2002-2003. In 2004 he established and drove for his own rally team, Subaru Team Arai. In 2006 he drove for the Subaru World Rally team one more time at Rally Japan. Arai and Tony Sircombe climbed as high as 5th place in the standings and dropped as low as 8th place. They went on to finish the rally in 6th place, making this their best result in a WRC class (Group A) car in their home event.
